summary: Structural Page Layouts - All 9 Features Tested and Verified. 5 structural layouts (Classic, Bento Grid, Tab Hub, Social Feed, Magazine) render correctly on the public landing page. Admin UI Style panel shows all 11 layout options (5 structural + 6 CSS overlay) with SVG previews. Layout switching via PUT /api/admin/ui-style works correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/admin/ui-style returns all 11 layout options (5 structural + 6 CSS overlay)
5 structural layouts present: mobile_app, bento_grid, tab_hub, social_feed, magazine
6 CSS overlay layouts present: storefront, portal, single_page, chat_app, card_grid, china_panama
Each layout has id, name, description, icon, category fields
Admin UI Style panel shows 5 structural layouts with SVG preview thumbnails
Layout selector buttons have correct data-testid attributes
Selecting Bento Grid layout and saving works - public page shows layout-bento testid
Selecting Tab Hub layout and saving works - public page shows layout-tabhub testid with tabs
Selecting Social Feed layout and saving works - public page shows layout-social testid
Selecting Magazine layout and saving works - public page shows layout-magazine testid
Restoring Classic (mobile_app) layout works - public page shows hero carousel
Admin panel itself is not affected by public layout changes (separate admin style object)
PUT /api/admin/ui-style saves layout correctly (tested all 5 structural layouts)
GET /api/public/ui-style returns the current public layout setting
critical_code_review_comments: SuperAppLanding.jsx correctly maps layout IDs to layout components using LAYOUT_COMPONENTS object
Each layout component (BentoGridLanding, TabHubLanding, SocialFeedLanding, MagazineLanding) has correct data-testid for testing
UIStyleModule.jsx separates structural layouts from CSS overlay layouts in the UI
ui_style_service.py correctly defines all 11 layouts with category field
Layout switching is immediate and UI updates reflect saved changes
shared.jsx provides reusable components across all layouts maintaining consistency

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are live and functional. Community content endpoints may return empty data.

context_for_next_testing_agent: 5 structural page layouts are fully implemented and working: 1) Classic (mobile_app) - Hero carousel with quick access grid, 2) Bento Grid (bento_grid) - Asymmetric tile dashboard, 3) Tab Hub (tab_hub) - Greeting + horizontal tabs, 4) Social Feed (social_feed) - Stories carousel + timeline, 5) Magazine (magazine) - 2-column editorial with sidebar. Each has data-testid attributes for testing. Layout switching via admin UI Style panel works correctly. The current production layout is set back to Classic (mobile_app).
